entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Dolbeau-Mistassini
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:38 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Normandin 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: SSW 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 18.
